mapper.update: update quan_index_future set exchange_id = #{exchangeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, future_index = #{futureIndex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, exchange_id, symbol, future_index, create_time, update_time from quan_index_future
